title: Create a new answer associated with a copy
name: CreateAnswer
description: This URL creates a new copy

Parameter.description: An object containing all the data necessary for its creation

201.description: a JSON object containing the created answer

title: Edit a copy
name: EditAnswer
description: This URL edits the answer of a copy

Parameter.description: An object with the information you want to edit.

201.description: a JSON object containing the edited answer

title: Get a specific answer
name: GetAnswerById
description: Returns a JSON containing a given answer ID

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Delete a copy
name: deleteAnswer
description: This deletes an answer of a copy

title: Create a new copy
name: CreateCopy
description: This URL creates a new copy

Parameter.description: An object containing all the data necessary for its creation

201.description: a JSON object containing the created copy

title: Edit a copy
name: EditCopies
description: This URL edit a copy from its id

Parameter.description: An object with the information you want to edit.

201.description: a JSON object containing the edited copy

title: Get all copies related to an exam
name: GetAllCopies
description: Returns a JSON containing all the copies for a given exam

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Get a specific copy
name: GetCopyById
description: Returns a JSON containing a given copy ID

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Delete a copy
name: deleteCopy
description: This deletes a copy

title: Create a new exam
name: CreateExam
description: This URL creates a new exam based on the body request

Parameter.description: An object containing all the data necessary for its creation

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
{
 "title": "Examen 3",
 "instruction": "Je n'ai pas d'instructions spéciales, à vous de jouer !",
 "reminders": "Tous documents interdit",
 "authorId": "abcdefghjkqspdsqpjpijp86972",
 "sessionId": "sqojfdoisqjdoiqj679089076",
}

201.description: a JSON object containing the created document

title: Delete an exam
name: DeleteExam
description: This URL deletes an exam from its id.

title: Get all exams
name: GetAllExams
description: This URL displays a JSON containing all exams from the database

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Get a correction
name: GetCorrectionById
description: This URL displays a JSON containing a correction for an exam

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Get an exam
name: GetExamById
description: This URL displays a JSON containing an exam from its id

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Edit an exam
name: PatchExam
description: This URL edit an exam from its id.

Parameter.description: an object with the information you want to edit.

examples.content:

title: Create a new exercice
name: CreateExercice
description: This URL creates a new exercice in the exam requested in the url

Parameter.description: An object containing all the data necessary for its creation

201.description: a JSON object containing the created document

title: Delete an exercice
name: DeleteExercice
description: This URL deletes an exercice of an exam based on both ids.

title: Edit an exercice
name: EditExercice
description: This URL edit an exercice from its id

Parameter.description: An object with the information you want to edit.

201.description: a JSON object containing the edited document

title: Create a new feedback
name: CreateFeedback
description: This URL creates a new feedback in the question requested

Parameter.description: An object containing all the data necessary for its creation

201.description: a JSON object containing the created document

name: DeleteFeedback

title: Get feedback from a question
name: GetFeedbackByQuestion
